snippet: Officials in Afghanistan blasted Western news media and research organizations as political agents after the release of a report that suggests the possibility of the country’s government collapsing.
abstract: Afghan government and some politicians and local news outlets denounce Western research organizations and news media, blasting them as spies and political agents in wake of report by International Crisis Group, which suggests it is possible Afghan government would collapse after 2014.
lead_paragraph: Officials in Afghanistan blasted Western news media and research organizations as political agents after the release of a report that suggests the possibility of the country’s government collapsing.

headline.main: Afghan Officials Denounce Western Group’s Report on Country’s Future
headline.print_headline: Afghan Officials Denounce Western Group’s Report on Future
